name: Space Chase (moorhou4)
description:
Space Chase created by Tate Moorhouse

Modifications:

Created four unique enemies with varying speeds, strengths, and scores.

Created 3 new Power Up elements with varying abilities such as increased fire rate and fluctuations of enemy speeds.

Created a worm hole element which allows the player to teleport across space.

Created four unique levels each increasing in difficulty.

Created a new spawner element which spawns enemies, or power ups at random times. The spawner also will not spawn an enemy when within a certain range of the player, lastly the spawners can rotate around a given point at varying speeds.
